about_the_game:
MonsterCare is a management-simulation game, where you play as a rookie owner of a wellness resort for monsters!

The world of monsters, not unlike our own, is a pretty stressful place, so a lot of them are way overdue for a relaxing getaway, and that’s where you come in!

Build and manage your dream resort to keep your patrons pleased and help them relax and unwind, all while growing and developing your business!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760, AMD Radeon R7 270X, or better
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 470, or better
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
